website_summaries.verdict: The Xenvo Pro Lens Kit easily converts between a wide-angle lens and an impressively detailed macro lens, features a LED light for when you need the perfect amount of brightness, and most importantly, it’s affordable. An all-around excellent set for iPhone photographers.
pros: Includes 15x zoom macro lens and 0.45x wide angle lens that may be used together or separately
No dark corners in the edges
cons: Although this lens includes a lanyard, it may be worth buying a case for your investment when you aren’t using it

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality lens
customer_reviews.text: Was going back and forth trying to decide if I should buy this lens kit or a different highly rated one listed on here. I was sold on the Xenvo when I compared the customer images for other lens kits and this one. I bought this for an upcoming vacation and I think this will work wonderfully. The carrying kit fits easily into my carry-on bag and the lenses themselves were intuitive and user-friendly. I appreciated the free video tutorials that came with it too. As you can see, so far I've used the macro to take very important images.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use with excellent results. I'm using on my iPhone 7 plus- no damage to the glass screen protector which I experienced with a different brand. Comes with a sturdy portable case and lens protectors.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my lens
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my lens. I take it whenever I travel and it captures the 'moments' much better than a traditional camera. Besides being an awesome lens, the customer service goes above and beyond! They helped me replace the back clip portion when I accidentally broke it backpacking. You won't regret buying this lens!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I dont know why I didnt read reviews first. ...
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why I didnt read reviews first. Its only for very close up pics plus u need a tripod or stand for your phone or it will blur. . I dont get how it could score so highly in reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: It says "wide angle" but what you get is more ...
customer_reviews.text: It says "wide angle" but what you get is more of a fish eye result... and a mediocre one at that. It also keeps falling off the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: the lens works wonderfully. I bought this specifically for my trip to ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product 10 stars I would! First off, the lens works wonderfully. I bought this specifically for my trip to Europe and got some AMAZING panoramic shots of the beautiful scenery! Even more important to me is that they have THE BEST customer service I HAVE EVER experienced. I accidentally broke my lens somehow during my travels and lost my warranty information, regardless they sent me a new lens within less than 24 hours of notifying them and were extremely polite and understanding about the whole thing. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE. MADE PHOTO QUALITY WORSE. IPHONE BETTER WITHOUT IT.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! No improvement to Iphone SE photos- wide angle or close-up shots. Played with the lens for extended period and found all shots were better without its use. The lens tended to blur or add no improvement or difference compared to the iphone alone. In fact, the iphone camera pictures were ALWAYS better the with use of the Xenvo lens. I had no problems with the lens attaching to phone or maintaining stability. It came in a very nice protective traveling case. HOWEVER, THIS PRODUCT HAS NO VALUE...I REALLY DON'T KNOW HOW IT GOT POSITIVE REVIEWS.
customer_reviews.author: Orangedice

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit iPhone 11 Pro Max
customer_reviews.text: Despite what I read, this doesn't fit the iPhone 11 Pro Max and makes it impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, not compatible with Samsung S9
customer_reviews.text: Despite what the reviews say and the description, this camera lens is NOT compatible with the Samsung Galaxy 9. I purchased this as a gift and we tried without the case, watching the instructional video and we could not get rid of the black ring. I'm sure it works great with iPhones. Sadly, we are returning it.
customer_reviews.author: kj808

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your time
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wouldn't waste my time making this purchase. Just invest in a camera or something. It doesn't even stay clamped to my iPhone properly. ALmost dropped this thing about 5 times already and at 9 months preggo once something hits the floor it stays there... Period
customer_reviews.author: 1st Klaz

customer_reviews.title: Scammy USB insert in box.
customer_reviews.text: They include a scammy usb stick in the box asking you to plug it into your computer to register your product warranty. That is a huge security risk. Don’t stick random USBs into your computer. There is no legitimate reason to use a usb stick as part of the registration process. As for the lens, the clip doesn’t hold onto my iPhone XS Max that well with a small case on it and the lens itself indices a small vignette in my images.
customer_reviews.author: John D Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Barrel Distortion and Soft Edges
customer_reviews.text: It is true that there was no vignetting which is why I bought this product, but, there is barrel distortion and soft edges which is why I am returning it. Barrel distortion is fixable if you don't mind editing every single photo, soft edges is not fixable other than to crop, which, kind of defeats the purpose of "wide" in a wide angle lens. I am pretty sure all of these lens' from any brand have one or more of these issues. Maybe the more expensive ones like Moment work, but, Moment requires you to buy a case that fits your phone and every time you change your phone you will need a new case.
customer_reviews.author: MVTV

customer_reviews.title: I'm loving my Xenvo wide lens
customer_reviews.text: It's so worth it to buy this wide lens from Xenvo. Now i can take photos of a room that shows wide visuality. The lens is not made out of plastic it's very durable.
customer_reviews.author: PA H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! ..but macro has a short drop off focus point
customer_reviews.text: From a middle age pro/semi-pro photographer. Love everything about this lens, even the packaging and case is well made! Kudos! The lens is solid and the optic glass looks good. Photo quality of both the wide angle & macro has extremely minor degradation compared to my normal iphone photos. The macro lens does have a short focus drop off point but I like the effect it can give. (Example attached). The lanyard is a great idea too and so is the info thumb drive/business card. You can tell this a company that cares. Worth every dollar and would definitely recommend it to anyone as an additional tool in your tackle box! *Please click 'helpful' if this was, thanks! :)
customer_reviews.author: Random Bytes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lens!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so for my trip to Alaska coming up so I can take wide angle landscape shots. I am using it on a Samsung Galaxy S5. I have a rubberized Otterbox and it works fine with that on. The clip with rubber pieces holds securely in place. Comes with nice tutorial you access on the computer and includes a lifetime warranty you can sign up for after watching the tutorial. The case is nice but a little tight to get everything in it. Overall I think I will be very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: C McGinty

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon opening
customer_reviews.text: Clip was broken upon opening package and I could not use it for my Europe trip. Very disappointed on the missed opportunity for more amazing pictures.
customer_reviews.author: krystle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy - low quality clips. Unusable after only a couple uses.
customer_reviews.text: The lens quality is good, but the clip broke after 1 gentle use, and the light clip was broken upon delivery. The product is useless and I would not recommend you buy this lens kit due to the fact that it will break within a couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Why do I have to fix your case?
customer_reviews.text: Dear manufacturer, how easy it could be to thoroughly think the storage case design? But yet you did not. The case is of awkward shape, not convenient to store lenses and accessories. Then why do you supply it? Just to say that you did? Attached are the pictures of how you COULD organize the box with lenses. It took me 5 minutes to cut it. Now, my review on the lense : Pros: - material quality (aluminum and lens) - lens covers Cons : - the wide angle lens is bulky and heavy. - inpractical storage - gimmicky led light - very narrow hole, that is easy to miss or vignette. I believe there are better solutions for wide angles..
customer_reviews.author: srinivasa ramanujan

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning but worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this product so bad!! I've tried the lens multiple times since buying and I am not impressed. The wide lens doesn't do much for the pictures and the macro lens makes everything blurry. I haven't tried the light but I probably won't use it. I have an iPhone 7 so it would be pretty difficult to put this to use. Overall I will be searching for another product. The packaging is nice and includes a carrying case to hold all the items I mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: does not fit Moto G5 plus
customer_reviews.text: Does not properly fit my Moto G5 plus as I was led to believe. The camera is a little bit lower on the phone (compared to iPhone) and even with my case removed, the clip does not allow the lens to sit down far enough so as to be centered on the camera. The result is blurry black distortion at the bottom of every picture. without the clip attached I held the lens centered on camera, with much difficulty, and the pictures did look great, exactly like I was expecting. However, lacking a clip with enough clearance to properly center the lens, this product will remain utterly useless...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement for this product reads great but once you attach it to your iPhone, you'll quickly realize it is a piece of trash, don't bother, save your money
customer_reviews.author: Manbyk

customer_reviews.title: Phone Camera Lens
customer_reviews.text: I have used this camera lens on my Samsung Galaxy A7. I have attached it to the phone with and without its protective case. The wide angle pictures are of good quality for both scenic and people groups so I am happy with the results. As yet I haven't used the close up lens as yet. The only issue is the clip that attaches the lens rests directly on the screne so I am very careful how I setup the lens. There is a thin soft plastic cover on the clip but I have a feeling it could damage the screen if I am not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A. Goodwill

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little macro lens!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely ADORE this little guy! Makes a HUGE difference while trying to get super-close ups on art and miniatures. I just grabbed some things off my hobby desk and tested the lens out today - super happy with it! I watched the videos on the usb card too - it's pretty common sense, but the presenter (Kai Pei) is SUPER HOT so the instructions were /very/ enjoyable! =D That aside, if you want to easily take artsy close ups, this is for you! I didn't even realize it came with a wide-angle lens and since I don't really care about it, you'll have to find a different review for info about that, lol. Happy photo hunting!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Solid lens attachment
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool for taking some more interesting iPhone shots. The wide angle lens gets fairly clear shots, I don't see a lot of distortion on it. Up close you can get fisheye like effects. The macro lens performs even better IMO - really nice crisp photos with a very shallow depth of field, just the way it should be. I'm not sure how it stacks up to the other similar options out there but it's been a great tool to have to provide some more feeling to the iPhone shots I take. Construction feels good and the case is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: ford escort serviceTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: You can't get MORE than you pay for
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for excellent image quality for your extra wide angle photos on smartphone, this is probably NOT for you. If you shoot architectural photography with your smart phone (Yes. It's quite possible LOL) and demand excellent optics with very minimal to no barrel distortion, then this is not for you. Sorry. But if you want an "OK" extra wide angle lens/attachment on your smartphone then, maybe this might be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Modamo

customer_reviews.title: Watch the tutorials, they are helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I almost hesitated to buy this kit based on a few reviews and a few comments saying it didn't work with the iPhone 7 Plus. Well, it sure does work with my iPhone 7 Plus. Most people just want to jump into a new product but if you take the time to read the tips and watch the videos, you will be happily surprised. The kit comes with a cleverly designed usb drive that sends you to the videos. Overall, the product is well made and you get a good bang for you buck.
customer_reviews.author: M.Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Samsung Galaxy S8+
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for my Samsung Galaxy S8+ but it took seconds for the camera to focus, and even then the focus was blurry. It seems like the Samsung Galaxy S8+'s camera doesn't recognize the outside zoom so it focuses on the lenses itself. I wouldn't recommend this product for Samsung Galaxy S8+. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd phot package I have purchased. The first 2 were a disappointment. As a seasoned real estate broker I've always used professional photographers for my listing photos. I now take my own photos using the Xenvo wide angle lens and I am pleased with the results. Finally I have a lens kit that produces great photos.
customer_reviews.author: DT3

customer_reviews.title: I would love to say how much I am enjoying this lens
customer_reviews.text: I would love to say how much I am enjoying this lens, however I had it for a total of an hour before my daughter fell in love with it and I have not seen it since! So if you want to know "is this a good product" My 19 year old LOVES IT! Now I will order one for myself and hide it from the rest of the family!
customer_reviews.author: ToniMarley

customer_reviews.title: Poor focus with XS Max. Compared to XS Max native camera, photos are not nearly as sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Poor focus with XS Max. Compared to XS Max native camera, photos are not nearly as sharp. Not much more to say. Planning to return as it just doesn’t seem to perform.
customer_reviews.author: Tecsi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Information and Tutorials provided
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product so I have not had a chance to explore with it much but I did want to comment on the exception communication from the seller. An advance email gave me information I needed to know before receiving the product. The tutorials included are well presented and easy to follow. Only feedback is that newer phones are not represented in the tutorial but for most of us the adjustments should be intuitive. Just on initial impressions, the seller has done an outstanding job to ensure users of this product are informed and comfortable to reach out for help if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Hunk Of Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reading reviews that seemed good and watching and looking at photos and video. 1.on photos there's a ring 2.On video it's blurry and you can't see anything I went into buying this junk thinking that people that gave it bad reviews were just over exaggerating but the weren't - main message - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: James Mcnamara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this product well-crafted, equal in quality to my professional photography gear, but its ability to capture crystal-clear photos with virtually no distortion is impressive. While I will still default to my professional camera gear for actual photo shoots, I am loving being able to use this to up my phone camera game as well as using it for better viewing on video teleconferencing. This lens works just as well on my MacBook Pro as it does on my iPhone 8+. I am very pleased with this purchase and I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MxRileyQuinn

customer_reviews.title: Bought to take close ups of jumper spiders
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the macro lens to take pictures of jumping spiders. They’re so small you need a good zoom to see their face. The zoom focuses and refocuses a lot. Not sure if it’s because I’m moving or I’m taking a picture through a plastic enclosure but it’s hard to get a good focus. But I have gotten a few good pictures. I’m going to try them outside the enclosure and see how it works. I have gotten good pictures from flowers and stuff. It might just be the spiders are so small and in a plastic enclosure. I’d recommend this product. It’s 100 x better then just the iPhone camera.
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit OnePlus 6T phones
customer_reviews.text: Can't comment on the picture quality or the build quality as I couldn't use the lens. The clip supplied in the kit is too short to fit my OnePlus 6T phone. Xenvo customer service response was that there's nothing they could do about it, and that I should return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Asher Cotigaro

customer_reviews.title: What a lens, baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little lens! It's big enough for my iPhone 11 Pro Max, it stays in place, and it makes pictures even sharper than the phone camera alone. The creatures don't seem to mind it being an inch away from their faces. The little light is a bonus. I'm super happy with this purchase and would get another one!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this lens set. I have only tried it so far with my phone case still on, but I’m still incredibly impressed with the results! The macro lens is extremely effective, the wide angle lens makes a huge difference (with the case on, my photos had vignettes because the lens was too far away from the actual camera, but Xenvo recommends taking off the case unless it is very thin), and the included light is wonderfully versatile. The packaging, accessories, and general design and presentation of the kit is also phenomenal. Just take a look at the photos I took! I would highly recommend This kit to anyone who will ever take a photo with a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Pictures aren’t good. Hashtag sad.
customer_reviews.text: It pains me to write this review - I was really excited when I tried someone else’s Xenvo lens and bought 3, one for myself and 2 for gifts. But when I used it for some photos of interior design projects, I saw the problem immediately: the edges of the photo are blurry and contain weird light distortions. The photos looked fine when viewed on the phone but not when blown-up. I was very sad since the product seems well made and customer support was good, but the photo quality is pretty unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grisham

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expsected
customer_reviews.text: Got this to take better pictures. I did watch the video that came with. It did not seem to do anything but make the picture worse outside which is what I wanted it for. Waste of money I think. I tried different setting and lights and nothing seemed to help.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this solely for the macro lens, I have an iPhone 11 Pro Max and didn’t need the wide angle. I was worrying about this lens working with the 3-camera configuration on the new iPhone but it is not issue, Just line it up over the correct camera. For the price you can’t go wrong with this, it actually looks and feels more expensive when you open it up, very nicely packaged and the quality is there. These are three photos I took in my house within the first five minutes of unboxing. An apple, a flower and my dog
customer_reviews.author: jmark

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference in my pictures! Love it...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome, I was so happy not only to see the lenses, but extras too. Like a lanyard to hold the lens for easy access, a light with 3 different lighting modes, a case, cleaning cloth and some great instructions videos that you can watch on your computer or cell phone. The videos are great for everything you need to know before using this lens (he’s very detailed). I love the passion that Kari Pei has for his product and he covers all bases on how to get the most out of these lenses. I highly recommend checking out this product, if you’re looking to significantly improve your cell phone camea pictures. The macro lens is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie H

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the lenses is quite good. These aren’t cheep plastic and seem quite sturdy. Doing some initial shots I was impressed with both the wide and macro. The actual clip part is plastic but holds the phone well. I would not leave it attached (clumped on) while moving from place to place as I could see it coming off but for shooting in a given spot it holds on just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Neilson

customer_reviews.title: The macro lens is great, but I am less impressed with the wide ...
customer_reviews.text: The macro lens is great, but I am less impressed with the wide angle. What you gain is not worth the bulk of the product or the price.. If the lens doesn't fit well, there will be black around the sides of the picture. I tried to get the lens to work with my iPhone X with a thin case, but I always had the black borders with my case on. I don't want to have to keep taking my case off to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Whispers

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The lens did not perform as described. They blurred the sides of my photos and the zoom lens didn’t zoom as expected. I attached the lens correctly. I didn’t have my phone cover on. I purchased this product based on the reviews. There are many people that are receiving free or discounted products in exchange for reviews. Now making the reviews hard to trust. I use to be able to buy a good product based on reviews but now it is hard to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great photo enhancement!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for my trip to Yellowstone this past summer, and I was not disappointed! I attached photos of the same picture with and without the added lens. You can definitely see a huge difference in the quality and wide angle it gives! I am so glad I got this because my photos are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Previously opened and looked used!
customer_reviews.text: This box came already opened and looked used. The carrying case was dirty and there was miscellaneous wrapping in the box as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this lens!
customer_reviews.text: Quality tool for the price tag! I use this lens on my iPhone 8 and xs max to take pre-listing photos of homes for my real estate business. The wide lens allows me to view the angles of a room to better assess the layout and flow of rooms. One tip: REMOVE THE PLASTIC! If you try attaching the lens without removing the plastic, it will slip off. I didn’t remove it at first and it kept popping off which eventually slightly bent the rim of the lens; user error. :-( Definitely a smart purchase and would recommend to anyone needing a quality product for the value conscious consumer.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a real estate agent and needed a simple wide-angle lens for my iPhone X. My first lens had some sort of defect, but one email to customer service and they had a new one on its way. I haven't figured out the macro lens yet, but the wide angle works wonderfully with a thin (or no) phone case. THANK YOU AGAIN to customer support, very highly suggest this product and manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase if you have an iPhone 7 plus/8 plus!!!
customer_reviews.text: The lens didn't work for my iPhone 8 plus, a very awkward fit. It's hard for the lens to stay in its place after clipping it on according to the instructions. Most importantly, the photos I took with the wide angle lens either have very blurry edges or black edges (because the lens itself slipped and go in the shot). The macro lens didn't work at all for my 8 plus (probably because 8 plus has double camera lens)
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Quality wide angle lens at reasonable price with GREAT support
customer_reviews.text: This lens arrived promptly and was packaged well, with a great carrying case and lanyard for use. I especially appreciated the great support provided, including videos for getting started and registration for support. I tried the lens out on a trip to La Jolla and was amazed at the difference between my standard pics and those with lens - a LOT more included in the photo with no reduction in sharpness. The lens was secure when attached to my iPhone and I appreciated having the lanyard available so I could easily switch. I'm looking forward to using it to capture wider vistas on an upcoming trip to Denali. Thanks for an excellent product with great & friendly support.
customer_reviews.author: Donna MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice lens kit
customer_reviews.text: I compared this to the Criacr/Amir macro/wide angle clip-on lens (; the Criacr also has a fisheye and is cheaper. I didn't notice any detail differences (admittedly superficial testing by photographing a printed ISO chart) between the two, which surprised me a little. I went with the Xenvo for more convenience issues - the clip works with my case better (lip on the front side, which admittedly could be fixed in either case with a little padding right at the end of the back side of the clip), the quick release lanyard, the zippered case which looks more secure and faster to use than the Criacr, and the LED light for macro shots.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for field work
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with the Xenvo lens kit. I volunteer as a citizen scientist making observations and entering them into a database to be reviewed by experts. Sightings are included on species lists that let land managers know the health of the ecosystem. My role is very small, but it's important that I take detailed photos because many plants have only subtle differences physically between them. And some wildflowers are almost microscopic. The better the photo, the more accurate the ID. This lens kit lets me take very closeup shots of details that scientists can then use to suss out what is growing and distinguish from other similar species. I'm thrilled!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Better off without it
customer_reviews.text: I have tried lots of times with different subject matter, watched the instructional video, and still, I almost never got a good shot with the macro lens. Nothing worthy of printing or posting. The depth of field is so shallow that there's always part of the subject out of focus. The iPhone by itself takes MUCH better macro photos. Just don't zoom or get so close that the phone can't focus. I don't care about the wide-angle either, so this kit sits gathering dust.
customer_reviews.author: jmv

customer_reviews.title: Do not use if your phone has more than one rear facing camera.
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials and come with useful accessories. But none of that make for great pictures. I have an iPhone Xs and maybe that is part of one of the problems. -The duel camera system on my phone doesn't allow for certain functions on the phone. For example optical zooming. While using the clip when I tried to zoom caused the screen to black out every time. Most likely because the clip's opening is only large enough for one rear facing camera at a time blocking the other out. -Problem number 2. Using the wide angle lens decreased the quality of the majority of the picture most notably starting with the peripheral corners of any picture.
customer_reviews.author: user_M

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for iridology photos
customer_reviews.text: I love this for ease of use and the fact that it will fit my phone dispite the bulky defender case I use. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is that I bought it specifically to do an iris photo, also known as iridology. I was not able to get a good iris photo because holding focus on the iPhone when I’m blinking and super close was just impossible. Maybe for somebody with blue eyes but I could not help but blink my brown eyes and ended up with sharp eyelashes and blurry irises. I have noticed that people with blue eyes have an easier time getting clear iris photos because of the light color.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie May

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to pursue my love for photography and buy some beginner equipment for my iPhone XR. These lenses are amazing and exceeded my expectations. The small carrying case perfectly stores everything you need to quickly grab your camera and go take some great photos. The tutorial videos are awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to attach to a phone non-destructively and take ...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to attach to a phone non-destructively and take some surprisingly-good wide angle photos. Note that the photos are pretty wide angle, but not like fish-eye-lens style. So don't expect anything crazy. Good for interior photos; if you're trying to sell a house or rent an apartment or something, maybe get one of these! I didn't find the macro lens to be terribly useful; it seemed to get only slightly closer than my phone normally, but maybe some real photographer would know what they are doing and have some use for it.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: I've been looking for a lens like this!
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone X with dual built-in camera lenses and was worried I wouldn't be able to find a wide angle adapter to fit. I saw a negative review for the Xenvo Pro Lens claiming the lens WON'T fit an iPhone X. I bought one anyway based on other user reviews and I'm happy I did. The lens has a nice weight to it and clips firmly onto my iPhone's thin rubber case. I occasionally shoot news video for a commercial TV station on my iPhone and a wide angle lens gives the video a very nice "non smartphone" look.
customer_reviews.author: George Warren

customer_reviews.title: For the money a nice little addition.
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Actually very pleased with the overall product. It fits on my larger android phone with otter case. I'll have to remove my pop socket, reposition it. The lens seems pretty sturdy and darn sharp for a cell phone. The little added light is an awesome bonus. Nice storage case and even a lanyard to put on it for portability. So far I'm quite impressed. I normally use a 'real' camera, but for some things this is just enough.
customer_reviews.author: natural health

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for shortcut wide angle photos
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lens to take wide angle real estate photos. It is an improvement over my iPhone X camera but if you really need fancy photos, you need a wide angle lens and a tripod for your dslr. My widest dslr lens is 15mm. This lens is definitely wide enough. It is very well constructed and the clip is substantial. But I still got some slight bowing in the vertical lines in my images. It is worth the money for a quick, easily portable solution if you don’t feel like lugging your dslr around.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Tran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Again user friendly with great videos on use and ways to maximise your use. I have purchased a couple of these and never used them because I couldn’t see a difference between photos using the lens and without the lens. Nice and rugged, great accessories can’t wait to use this in the great outdoors. Oh and the light is way cool! Videos were so helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Great macro and wide lenses
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to opportunity to use them for more than a few days, but the lenses are solid and the photos are great. I'm using an obviously outdated iPhone X, but these lenses have breathed new life into an old phone. They are high quality and well-built. Add in the nice clip on light and this set is a must have for anyone looking to add some macro or wide angle lenses to their phone kit!
customer_reviews.author: azknightindustries

customer_reviews.title: Seeing More of the World with Xenvo!
customer_reviews.text: 1) Right of the box the device does not feel cheap. First impression is a good one. 2) It was packaged very nicely. The packaging made a statement about what the makers think of their product. 3) The device looks nice. 4) The tutorials are very well done. You can tell the makers believe in their product. 5) The device works at advertised - even better than expected. 6) I plan to purchase another as well as the Bluetooth remote (if I can find out how to get it). 7) I will refer anyone I know who would be interested in such a device!
customer_reviews.author: The Oracle

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT quality macro lens !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. See the pix taken with my Samsung Galaxy Note 8, and table salt and the edge of a peach box. These were my first photos with the macro lens. All materials are top notch- appear equal quality to my Canon EOS. The kit with case and little rechargeable LED illuminator is excellent - only minor complaint is that if the case were just a bit larger, then the lenses could be left attached to the clip when stored, instead of having to be separated to fit. Haven't yet used the wide angle, but for me, the value of the macro makes this already well worth the ~$40
customer_reviews.author: A. ZWERLING

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: I expected a little more from all the reviews. Will be gifting this to someone else and looking for another set; maybe one that comes with a case that actually mounts easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: No point if you own a newer model iPhone
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good quality; however it doesn’t work well with the newer model iPhones. I have an XS Max and due to its irritating automatic telephoto feature, this lens really doesn’t help capture great quality macro photos. When I inquired about returning it because of this all I heard from the manufacturer was crickets, despite their customer satisfaction guarantee. All in all, not a bad product, but useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wide angle len
customer_reviews.text: I have the pixel 2xl and the selfie video mode is just way too close. I needed something where the frame is bigger for more background and such. This serves a perfect solution. The only reason I give this a 4 star is that it's on the heavier side. If you have this lens on your phone and you have a gimbal like an osmo action 3, it'll have issues balancing the phone and this together. The gimbal would give out occasionally as the weight is too much for the gimbal to handle. Other than that, the built is of great quality. Wish it wasn't as heavy.
customer_reviews.author: jerry chanh ly

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PLUG IN USB STICK!!
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine. You get what you pay for. But DO NOT plug in the USB stick they give you which is apparently an 'instruction manual.' Other reviews mention that it does not work. Let me assure you, it does. As soon as you plug it in to your computer it installs malware (a virus) on your computer. I used an old computer to test it and sure enough I could see it running code despite not popping up in any kind of disk manager. Did a malware scan and boom there was malware. DO NOT PLUG IN THE PROVIDED USB STICK!
customer_reviews.author: WormZ

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting more
customer_reviews.text: After I got this, I was really happy as it did what the description says, what make me uncomfortable after that is I found too many products does the same thing with even more accessories for way less money 🤨🤨
customer_reviews.author: Akram Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: I make rings and cuffs from coins, taking quality pics is an important part of my marketing. I previously used an Oll*clip lens and the pics were better than if I took them with just my phone but the XENVO lens that I just bought is way better, in the quality of the pics as well as the quality of the lenses. The XENVO makes the other clip on lens seem like a toy! BTW, the pics above are a cuff made from a .999 silver, 2 ounce Aztec Calendar coin. The first pic was taken with the macro lens and the second pic with the wide angle lens. For both pics I used the XENVO clip on LED light.
customer_reviews.author: pam obrien

customer_reviews.title: We really like this new lens kit from Xenvo!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for close up with Macro lens. BUT! Wide-angle lens is perfect for our family reunion picture. For this price range, it's a great lens kit for a smartphone. I am using an iPhone 8 Plus. Works with my thin leather protection case. Adding the extra light is so useful and thoughtful. Xenvo company thinks outside the box. Great Job!
customer_reviews.author: William L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Blurry pics
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea and took it on a tour of national parks, but every image was VERY blurry around all edges. The blur came in so far that cropping couldn't produce a good image.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Boy have these been fun!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these lenses. I've taken some wonderful close-ups and am very happy with them. I'm interested in looking for a zoom lens as well for some planned travel. Packaging was Apple-like--very professional. And the lenses came with a case and a very small clip-on intense light with three strengths. Very nice. I'd buy this again and have recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: CWC

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: This more than fulfilled my expectations! First off; the packaging is top notch. I really love the case, ciip on LED light and product instructions on a USB card. Very impressive! The lens works perfectly. As advertised, no distortion in the images and using my Note 9 and iPhone 8 I'm able to take very smooth video and wider photos with it. I highly recommend for a quality photo add-on to a flagship smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: LeilaM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for insects and spiders
customer_reviews.text: So I needed a macro lens for my iPhone 11. I love taking pictures of insects and other arthropods. I decided to go with this budget option and I am glad I did. I am able to get good pictures and it’s been helpful with arthropod identification. I haven’t used the telephoto lens as my focus was on macro photography, but I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lens with fantastic support!
customer_reviews.text: The lenses work really well. I thought my iphone 7 plus upgraded camera was so much better than the iphone 6...and it is...but these lenses take it to the next level. I took comparison pics with and without the lenses on...wow. Super clear and detailed closeups far beyond what the camera alone can do. Same for the wide angle. These lenses have a very high quality feel to them. And the packaging and instructions are impressive. It even comes with a little usb that gives you several well made video tutorials. Also comes with a carry case (well made), a clip on light, a carry lanyard...the works. Could not be any happier with this lens kit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nanney

customer_reviews.title: Great Lens for Realtors
customer_reviews.text: I am a realtor and was looking for an easy way to take better shots of interior rooms and gardens for marketing when I needed something quickly. This wide angle lens works Great! I must say when I first purchased it, I had an issue with blurry edges and emailed customer support. I was AMAZED to hear back almost immediately! She suggested making sure the back surface was flat so the clip sat firmly and it helped but was still fuzzy. My replacement lens came the NEXT DAY!! Which worked perfectly! I was so very impressed with such great service! Definitely a worth while purchase! Also great for group photos.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Great clarity. Solid build. Not cheaply made. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought lenses for my wife's iPhone that were awesome. I use an android and wondered if there was something out there for me as well. I take a lot of picture to post on my social media and websites. After doing my research, I settled on the Xenvo. Great choice. The wider view is amazing along with the clarity. I have a galaxy s9 plus. The only thing that I like more with package for the iPhone is, it came with a phone case that herr lenses screw into. If we had that guys, bam. You would be greater. Once I get a chance, I will upload some pics as examples.
customer_reviews.author: Herschel R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I've only really believed that if you wanted quality photos, you should stick to an actual camera. But this lens proved me wrong. Even with an older phone, the picture seemed just a little better than w/ the stock lens. The wide angle was nice and it didn't warp the image. The macro lens, I have not had a use for yet, but seems pretty cool. The only issue I had was the clip that attaches to the phone is much larger than most clips. This limits your options when using your phone with certain rigs as the clip won't fit within some stabilizing rigs. Overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Law

customer_reviews.title: Crisp little lens - very affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Great lens, especially for the price. I was going to try a more expensive brand, but I wanted to try this one first. I'm glad I did! Both lenses (wide angle and macro) are great. I'm really impressed with the quality. I love that it comes with its own travel case, too. Very small and portable. Great for hiking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: Using the Pixel XL - Right out of the box I found Vignetting issues. Had returned a different lens for the same reason and gave the Xenvo a try.. Not seeing much of a difference to recommend more than another.
customer_reviews.author: K. Close

customer_reviews.title: I don't know the purpose of this
customer_reviews.text: I'm about to take a motorcycle trip and wanted some additional wide angle functionality for my phone rather than take a different camera as size is important. I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 10. I have yet to figure out the purpose of this lens. Granted my phone already had wide angle functionality, but the pictures with and without the lens look the same to me. I'll keep playing with it but I'm not sure it is a good solution for my particular camera. There is also a possibility I don't have the proper eye for good photography.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures, but....
customer_reviews.text: Pictures look great, however it feels like it might fall off at any second. So I end up taking it off every time I was done taking a picture, it hopes of not dropping or losing it. I will be looking to purchase a more secure one.
customer_reviews.author: Srod

customer_reviews.title: Barrel shows on iPhone XS Max
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I am giving 3 stars is due to the fact it does not work well with the new iPhone XS Max. You can see part of the clips/lens in all the corners sadly. Worked well with my 7+. Will have to find a new one for my XS Max unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Affordable High Quality clip-on Lens!!
customer_reviews.text: This lens blew me away. I thought it was going to be super cheap and flimsy but it is everything, but! Bonus that it comes with it's on instructional video via clever USB card. I remove my case since it's a little thicker than most other cases, but that was something I was already planning to do when I use this lens. Love the lanyard clip and the fact that it comes with a bonus rechargeable clip-on light! The case fits the lens, the lanyard, the light and its charging cable, and a cleaning cloth all perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: lovendestroy

customer_reviews.title: Well engineered & nicely priced. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a very reasonable price! I recommend taking the cover off your smart phone, unless the cover is super thin. Nicely packaged, lenses are a good weight (the kind you expect from a more pricey package) and they seem to be very well made. I got this to take some additional real estate photos to show off improvements to a property that took place after main listing photos were taken - I didn't expec the little added clip on light but it works very well - has 3 different levels, and it came in handy immediately. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Waiting to hear back from Xenvo
customer_reviews.text: The LED light broke after one day. Reported to Xenvo immediately. Waiting to hear back. Nothing yet. I'll edit review if this is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Leia

customer_reviews.title: Far better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to get a sense of scale and quality from product pics so when I opened the package to find these lenses I was taken aback. They are larger and far better quality than I had imagined for $40. I hadn't realized it came with the case and even an auxiliary light with 3 settings. Wow. I am snapping off macros everywhere I turn. A warning ~ be careful where you point that thing. Suddenly EVERYTHING needs cleaning and you're a lot older looking than you think. :o)
customer_reviews.author: Rhuby Dub

customer_reviews.title: High quality lens kit
customer_reviews.text: We bought three different brands of camera lenses for Christmas gifts. This one is the nicest. The lenses are high quality and easy to use. Picture quality is excellent. I am using this on an iPhone 7 with an Otterbox and there is no problem with clipping the lenses on or with vignetting. The videos provided to get you started are helpful and shows that Xenvo wants you to get the most out of your purchase so you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value, Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: The video tutorials were amazingly helpful. The packaging was super professional and kept the products safe during transit. The lenses themselves are great! I need the wide angle lenses primarily, to photograph real estate, and it enhances the photos tremendously. I’ve actually gotten a substantial amount of business since updating my photos, after using this set!
customer_reviews.author: LaurenH

customer_reviews.title: Not iPhone compatible
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does not fit an iPhone X or any of the iPhones that have the dual camera, if the camera tries to focus at all it will be a black picture
customer_reviews.author: Allison Vetter

customer_reviews.title: Useless Clip-on System Renders Lenses nuseable
customer_reviews.text: The truth is, I don't really know how well these lenses do or don't work. I have a relatively modern, dual-lens phone (8-Plus) and there's simply no way to get the clip to stay stationary, so the lenses slide all over the place. After ~two weeks of use - TWO WEEKS!! - I wasn't able to capture a single macro picture. Not one. For all I know, these are the most finely-crafted, precision-machined lenses in the entire world, and I'll never, because the installation system is a 3 cent plastic clip.
customer_reviews.author: Xeth Waxman

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting another cheap piece of crap, This set of lenses is NOT a POC. It is well made with quality materials. My initial impression is that only I would have preferred a wider wide-angle lens. Maybe in version two. The card USB video instruction videos is novel and well thought out. I would also like to see a super-telescopic lens. Lastly, I have a Samsung Note9 with an "Otter" case. I have tried other CCC so-called lens kits and not only have they not fit my phone but the optical quality was simply not there and was returned. In short Good Job! Good Product!
customer_reviews.author: T from Long Island

customer_reviews.title: Box is full of Human Hair!
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to get a "Like New" product. Unfortunately I got a very old and used product. It has full of human hair everywhere inside the box. Main lens, LED light, box, strap everything is full of human hair! It is extremely GROSS! How could a "like New" product is full of hairs everywhere? I think someone used this to cut hair. Utterly disgusting! I don't eve want to touch it anymore. Eww.. By the way, I forgot to mention the lens is full of scratches. I cannot believe I got a product like this!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Maintain Social Distancing with Xenvo Pro
customer_reviews.text: The Xenvo Pro wide angle lens is a must when trying to get everyone together in class for a Zoom meeting during COVID-19. It's a snap, just clip it to your laptop camera and everyone can still maintain the correct social distance. The image attached was shot using Zoom on a MacBook Air.
customer_reviews.author: MacDood

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you get even less than what you paid for...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for macro shots. Not only did it not enhance my photos but it actually made the worse. Last but not least, be very aware of the registration chip. I made the mistake of inserting it into my pc, took me days to reformat my computer back to its default settings, what a nightmare. After all was said and done, never did get it registered, just a scam. Oh well, will probably toss in the trash and keep shopping, elsewhere that's for sure....
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations across the board
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional made product. You can clearly see the attention to detail and careful execution that went into it. It seems they have thought of everything! - 2in1 lenses fit comfortably together - Carry case - Clip light with charger - Polishing cloth - Lanyard - Helpful videos for use - Lifetime warranty Very excited to use this project more on creative projects that begin on my phone. Each item individually is high quality creating a bundle that is truly an amazing value! #notsponsored
customer_reviews.author: Rhachel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: The wide angle lens takes a bit getting used to. Unfortunately, it scratched my flash on the back of my phone when adjusting, but that's my fault. Be careful when putting this on your phone and DO take off your phone case to avoid the vignette effect. This lens works great for wide angle, but the macro lens takes a bit to master. If your phone's camera has a manual (pro) mode, use that to your advantage to put the focus in manual mode if you're using the macro lens. If not, and you have shaky hands like me, you're going to have a hard time focusing on the smaller objects.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, Excellent service and Advice
customer_reviews.text: Kai the co-founder called me about my question as to whether I should shed my life proof case before clipping the lens on. He explained the pros and cons about it. These folks know what customer service is about! It’s best to have it as close as possible to the iPhone lens like he stated, but wow, it still works great even clipped to my life proof case😎. They are a great company with great products and Kai is definitely a customers best friend. You can tell they really care about you as a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Using with iPhone 10s Max for wide angle shots of cars and it shortens the distance I need to get to fit the subject in the frame. No fisheye effect. Works great. Came with a clip on flash light I haven’t used but seems neat. Great case as well. Highly recommend. Only downside I find myself constantly having to adjust it on the phone but I also leave my case on which doesn’t help, but I’m afraid of dropping my phone.
customer_reviews.author: SeanO

product_meta.title: Xenvo Pro Lens Kit for iPhone, Samsung, Pixel, Macro and Wide Angle Lens with LED Light and Travel Case
feature_bullets: ✔ COMPATIBLE WITH ALL SINGLE AND DUAL-CAMERA PHONES including ALL iPhone models, Samsung Galaxy and Note, Google Pixel, Huawei and more. CONTENTS INCLUDE: TruView 0.45x Wide Angle Lens, Clarus 15x Macro Lens, TruGrip Lens Clip, GlowClip Mini Rechargeable LED Light + Charging Cable, Quick-Release Lanyard, DuraCase, EasyClip, Cleaning Cloth and LIFETIME WARRANTY.

✔ TRUVIEW 0.45x WIDE ANGLE LENS - CAPTURE 45% MORE PICTURE WITH EVERY SNAP: Shoot stunning photos of people, pets, travel scenery, landscapes, architecture, selfies and more. NO DARK CORNERS (vignetting) like cheaper lenses. Crafted from aircraft-grade aluminum and premium optical glass for durability and clarity. Multi-element, coated glass lenses minimize ghosting, reflections, lens flare, and other artifacts. Xenvo cell phone lens attachment is ideal for hobbyists and photography pros alike.

✔ CLARUS 15x MACRO LENS - MARVEL YOUR SENSES. MAGNIFY NEARBY SUBJECTS FOR BREATHTAKING, SUPER CLOSE-UP PHOTOS: Capture all the intricacies and details with precision-focus for razor crisp macro photos every time. (For best results, position macro lens approximately 1/2 inch from subject. Not designed for zooming in on distant subjects.) THE TRUGRIP LENS CLIP offers SUPERIOR GRIPPING POWER to fasten your lenses to your cell phone when you're in action mode, framing your next perfect shot.

✔ GLOWCLIP RECHARGEABLE LED FILL LIGHT - The GlowClip LED light clips ANYWHERE on your phone to instantly illuminate your subject and surroundings with warm continuous light. The warm and natural LED light is superior to your smartphone's built in flash—which can be blinding and unnatural—especially in darker settings and venues. FEATURES 3 BRIGHTNESS SETTINGS: Low, Medium and High. Say goodbye to frustrating photo "retakes" and hello to brilliant photos the first time.

✔ QUICK-RELEASE LANYARD AND TRAVEL CASE - TRANSPORT AND PROTECT YOUR LENS KIT: Perfect for taking your Xenvo lenses with you on the fly. The travel case stores and protects all lens kit components snugly and safely while the quick-release lanyard is the perfect way to carry your lenses on your next outing. Just drape the lanyard and lens around your neck. The quick-release lanyard head makes it a cinch to access your Xenvo lenses in a flash so you never miss another photo moment.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,623 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
